data_policy_id.description: User-assigned (human readable) ID of the data policy that needs to be unique within a project. Used as {dataPolicyId} in part of the resource name.

data_policy_type.description: The enrollment level of the service. Possible values: ["COLUMN_LEVEL_SECURITY_POLICY", "DATA_MASKING_POLICY"]

location.description: The name of the location of the data policy.

name.description: Resource name of this data policy, in the format of projects/{project_number}/locations/{locationId}/dataPolicies/{dataPolicyId}.

policy_tag.description: Policy tag resource name, in the format of projects/{project_number}/locations/{locationId}/taxonomies/{taxonomyId}/policyTags/{policyTag_id}.

predefined_expression.description: The available masking rules. Learn more here: https://cloud.google.com/bigquery/docs/column-data-masking-intro#masking_options. Possible values: ["SHA256", "ALWAYS_NULL", "DEFAULT_MASKING_VALUE", "LAST_FOUR_CHARACTERS", "FIRST_FOUR_CHARACTERS", "EMAIL_MASK", "DATE_YEAR_MASK"]

routine.description: The name of the BigQuery routine that contains the custom masking routine, in the format of projects/{projectNumber}/datasets/{dataset_id}/routines/{routine_id}.

block.description: The data masking policy that specifies the data masking rule to use.
